basic_info.description_introduction: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Tejaswi Jambula. I'm a full stack developer
basic_info.description: I like designing, developing and delivering user friendly web applications. I have experience working with technologies like React, Angular and Node JS. I adore how a simple click or tap does beautiful things , which inspired me to start my web developer journey. User experience, beautiful pixels and writing clean accessible, human code matters to me.

projects.title: EPM SALES
projects.description: Hybrid Mobile Application and Web Application for IBM to maintain their global sales analytics. In SMS, we used to have sales reporting using IBMâ€™s well-known BI tool Congoâ€™s. However, to enhance the user experience and faster results SMS came up with a plan of web application named EPM sales which fulfils the analytical assistance to the analysts as well as various sales managers of IBM

projects.title: SMS Skyline
projects.description: SMS which stands for Sales Management Support team in IBM supports IBMâ€™s sales and business by delivering the necessary assets/reports to the Sales Management across IBM and in turn helping the organisation to grow in its business.SMS SKYLINE was a pilot project of EPM SALES, with better user experience as well as better analytical insights to help them grow in IBMâ€™s business. The applicationâ€™s faster response was the key objective of SKYLINE application which was developed using Angular JS as front end and node JS as back end.

projects.title: Content Migration Tool
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. It is an Application to automate the testing of content migration projects for example from Salesforce to Adobe Experience Manager and various combinations.

freelanceProject.title: POINT OF SALE SYSTEM
freelanceProject.description: A Web based POS system for small and medium scale vendors which is a SaaS product. It includes different modules such as Billing, Inventory Management, Customer Acquisition with data and analytics, and Sales Analytics. As a Full stack developer, designed and developed the product which is light-weight and easy to use interface. Worked authentication and authorization modules using JWT tokens.
